_header: Whoso loveth not to do aright
Note:
Cf. Walther (1963)
XWalther, Hans. Proverbia sententiaque latinitatis medii aevi. 6 vols. Göttingen, 1963-69, no. 24207a.
_description: A proverbial couplet, translating ‘Qui male agit odit lucem’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook
